E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1974
Subject: Progress of Dale Murray
Dear Sir,
Dale Murray has nothing more to prove at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an ERA of 3.32 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Tommy Helms



Date: Sunday, 6/8/1974
Subject: Larry Gura healing process
Larry Gura is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
